test-case.description: writes outputs and summary for exit code 0 (diff=false)

test-case.description: does not throw when fail-on-diff is false and exit code is 1 (diff=true)
test-case.name: Invoke-CompareVI input and output validation (no CLI).does not throw when fail-on-diff is false and exit code is 1 (diff=true)

test-case.description: writes outputs then throws for unknown exit code (diff=false)

test-case.description: throws when fail-on-diff is true with exit code 1, but writes outputs

test-case.description: uses mocked Resolve-Cli value in result

test-case.description: throws when fail-on-diff is true but still writes outputs

test-case.description: returns diff=false for equal files
